subject: Re: Make yourself more attractive to others
body:
I was born overweight and teased because of it most of my younger years. Finally at age 26 I took the initialtive and purchased a 2 month supply of Anatrim. I have since shed 32 pounds of unwanted weight and have a new enthusiasm for life! I go out more, socialize more, and have even met a special lady who I love. I credit much of my new-found happiness to the weight I lost and your product. Try IT
http://www.cheingo.com/?415rjnzar
